alert.note: Alert for Concho; Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 9:43PM CDT until June 24 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Tom Green County in west central Texas... Northwestern Concho County in west central Texas... East central Irion County in west central Texas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 943 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of O.c. Fisher Reservoir to Twin Buttes Reservoir to near Knickerbocker, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... San Angelo and Lake Nasworthy around 950 PM CDT. Goodfellow Air Force Base around 1000 PM CDT. Veribest around 1005 PM CDT. Wall around 1010 PM CDT. Lowake and Mereta around 1030 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Harriet and Us-67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
